sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个形容词均有"感谢的，感激的"之意。
means: grateful ： 普通用词，侧重因对方的恩惠、好意或帮助，从内心产生的感激之情。
appreciative与greatful基本同义，但语气较强，侧重以行动或言语来感谢。

sentence.Network_en: Instead of complaining about what's wrong, be grateful for what's right.
sentence.Network_cn: 别抱怨不好的事，要对好的事心存感恩。

sentence.Network_en: We are grateful to you for permission to reproduce this article.
sentence.Network_cn: 非常感谢您允许我们复印这篇文章。

sentence.Network_en: He was grateful for a chance to relax and collect his thoughts.
sentence.Network_cn: 他很庆幸有机会放松放松，整理一下自己的思绪。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 690个英语四级高频词汇 ... fertilizer n. 肥料 435. grateful a. 感激的 436. gratitude n. 感激 437.
12.解析：能够奇迹般地恢复健康，她非常感激（grateful）。答案：C13.解析：句意为：她还告诉“我”，她第一次看见（saw）“我”时 …
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... gratification n 满足；喜悦 grateful a 感谢的；愉快的 ingrate n 忘恩负义之人.
I was grateful that they didn ' t ask me ., 我感到庆幸的是他们没有问我.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from obsolete grate 'pleasing, agreeable, thankful' (from Latin gratus) + -ful

entry.def: If you are grateful for something that someone has given you or done for you, you have warm, friendly feelings towards them and wish to thank them.

example.ex: She was grateful to him for being so good to her...
example.tran: 他对她这么好，令她很感激。

example.ex: I should like to extend my grateful thanks to all the volunteers.
example.tran: 我想对所有的志愿者致以衷心的谢意。

auth_sentence.content: The Breathing Places team is grateful to you all.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Breathing Places team is grateful to you all.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Breathing Places team is grateful to you all.

auth_sentence.content: I am so grateful for any new scientific proof.
auth_sentence.res_content: I am so grateful for any new scientific proof.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I am so grateful for any new scientific proof.

auth_sentence.content: You should just be grateful your baby's alive .
auth_sentence.res_content: You should just be grateful your baby's alive .
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You should just be grateful your baby's alive .

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"有……的;充满……的"; 2. 表名词,"满,量"

stems_affixes.word_buile: bane毒药,祸害+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.有害的,致祸的
cheer愉快,欢呼+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.愉快的,高兴的
faith信任,信念+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.守信的,忠实的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 健忘的,不注意的,疏忽的
stems_affixes.word_buile: forget忘记+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.健忘的,不注意的,疏忽的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 果实结得多的,多产的,富有成效的
stems_affixes.word_buile: fruit果实+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.果实结得多的,多产的,富有成效的
grace优美+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.优美的
grate=grat感激+ful多……的→adj.[to,for]感激的;感谢的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 给人希望的,抱有希望的
stems_affixes.word_buile: hope希望+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.给人希望的,抱有希望的
power力量+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.强大的,有力的
rue悔恨+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.后悔的,遗憾的
shame耻辱+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.可耻的;不道德的
success成功,胜利+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.成功的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 深思的,有思想性的,体贴的,关切的
stems_affixes.word_buile: thought思考,想法+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.深思的,有思想性的,体贴的,关切的
will意志+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.任性的,故意的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 令人惊奇的,奇妙的,极好的
stems_affixes.word_buile: wonder奇迹+ful有……的;充满……的→adj.令人惊奇的,奇妙的,极好的
spoon匙+ful满,量→adj.一匙的量
arm臂,抱+ful满,量→n.一抱之量
hand手+ful满,量→n.一把;少数;一小撮
mouth口+ful满,量→n.满口,一口,少量
grate=grat感激,高兴+ful充满……的→adj.[to,for]感激的;感谢的
gratuity[[n.赏钱,小费]]涔吹腫给小费可多可少]→所以"无缘无故"的
ingratiate[v.逢迎,讨好]+ing……的→adj.讨好的,谄媚的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 优美,文雅;恩惠,恩泽;宽限,缓刑;感恩祷告
stems_affixes.word_buile: grace=grat感激,高兴→感激别人态度一定好,所以grace有了"文雅"的意义
gratify[v.使高兴,使满足]+ication表名词→gratification满足
grat感激,高兴+itude状态→n.感激,感谢
grat感激,高兴+uity=ity表名词→因感激而给小钱,小费
in不+grat感激,高兴+e→不感谢→忘恩负义

stems_affixes.value_cn: 祝贺, 庆贺, 恭喜
stems_affixes.word_buile: con共同+gratulate[v.欢迎, 祝]→v.祝贺, 庆贺, 恭喜
grat感激,高兴+ify使……→使[人]满足,高兴
grat感激,高兴+ulate→让[别人]高兴→祝贺
in使……+grat感激,高兴+iate表动词→使别人高兴→讨好

Sentence.sentence: Since money is known to be one of the things most likely to bring a relationship to its knees, we should be grateful.
Students will be grateful in the long run.

sentences.en: They sent us a grateful letter.
sentences.cn: 他们给我们寄来了一封感谢信。

sentences.en: I'd be very grateful if you could let me know as soon as possible.
sentences.cn: 如果你尽快让我知道我将非常感激。

jushi.english: They sent us a grateful letter.
jushi.chinese: 他们给我们寄来了一封感谢信。

jushi.english: When Tom gave him the money, the beggar was surprised and seemed grateful.
jushi.chinese: 当汤姆给他钱时,这名乞丐很惊奇而且好像很感激。
